controller

Class LobbySceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AbstractSceneController
      • controller.LobbySceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LobbySceneControllerInterface, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LobbySceneController
extends AbstractSceneController
implements LobbySceneControllerInterface

    The LobbySceneController is the controller for the lobby interface. It delegates the show the game that are able to join or spectate.
